title: Panic occurred while running `cargo check`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Panic occurred while running `cargo check`. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.57.0 (f1edd0429 2021-11-29) binary: rustc commit-hash: f1edd0429582dd29cccacaf50fd134b05593bd9c commit-date: 2021-11-29 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.57.0 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', /rustc/f1edd0429582dd29cccacaf50fd134b05593bd9c\compiler\rustc_hir\src\definitions.rs:452:14 ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: 0x7ffb74ae92cf - ::fmt::h53606b08c01ef688 1: 0x7ffb74b1306a - core::fmt::write::he97f21b785b90134 2: 0x7ffb74adb448 - ::fmt::h967100caef347f28 3: 0x7ffb74aecd96 - std::panicking::take_hook::hb46205f0055becfd 4: 0x7ffb74aec797 - std::panicking::take_hook::hb46205f0055becfd 5: 0x7ffb5032a295 - ::flush::hff7a705da113f4ca 6: 0x7ffb74aed6a9 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::hce0846b912adb5c5 7: 0x7ffb74aed11f - rust_begin_unwind 8: 0x7ffb74ae9bf7 - ::fmt::h53606b08c01ef688 9: 0x7ffb74aed0a9 - rust_begin_unwind 10: 0x7ffb74b49510 - core::panicking::panic_fmt::h58715deff5969a45 11: 0x7ffb74b4945c - core::panicking::panic::hc36befec1b90302c 12: 0x7ffb53bab97e - ::def_path_hash_to_def_id::h9f7b03ae96e81f81 13: 0x7ffb548beeb4 - rustc_middle::dep_graph::dep_node:: for rustc_span::def_id::LocalDefId>::recover::he3ec8272ca40aa05 14: 0x7ffb53ad1dad - rustc_query_impl::query_callbacks::hir_owner::force_from_dep_node::h913d78c1ee69fb04 15: 0x7ffb53b2cb34 - ::try_mark_green::h79c2867594abd9a1 16: 0x7ffb53b2cb0b - ::try_mark_green::h79c2867594abd9a1 17: 0x7ffb53b2cb0b - ::try_mark_green::h79c2867594abd9a1 18: 0x7ffb53b2cb0b - ::try_mark_green::h79c2867594abd9a1 19: 0x7ffb53b0497d - ::try_mark_green::h79c2867594abd9a1 27: 0x7ffb53a82972 - ::spec_to_self_profile_string::h641e5a6d4a18de66 28: 0x7ffb53824849 - ::fmt::hdad43e681eb5eae7 29: 0x7ffb53aee095 - ::try_mark_green::h79c2867594abd9a1 30: 0x7ffb5037e59a -
